title: Prime Minister remembers sacrifice of brave Sahibzades on Veer Baal Diwas
content:
Press Release:Press Information Bureau Prime Minister's Office Prime Minister remembers sacrifice of brave Sahibzades on Veer Baal Diwas प्रविष्टि तिथि:
                26 DEC 2025 9:27AM by PIB Delhi The Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi remembers sacrifice of the brave Sahibzades on the occasion of Veer Baal Diwas, today. Shri Modi stated that this day is associated with courage, conviction and righteousness. The Prime Minister posted on X: "Veer Baal Diwas is a day of reverence, dedicated to remembering the sacrifice of the brave Sahibzades. We recall the unshakeable faith of Mata Gujri Ji and the immortal teachings of Sri Guru Gobind Singh Ji. This day is associated with courage, conviction and righteousness. Their lives and ideals will continue to motivate people for generations." Veer Baal Diwas is a day of reverence, dedicated to remembering the sacrifice of the brave Sahibzades. We recall the unshakeable faith of Mata Gujri Ji and the immortal teachings of Sri Guru Gobind Singh Ji. This day is associated with courage, conviction and righteousness.
